body_html:
It seems this needs to be set up: http://docs.travis-ci.com/user/deployment/heroku/#Running-commands ... I guess dpl (and thus travis) doesn't know that this is a rails app and requires running migrations.

Just gonna add this. Let's see what happens :)

body:
It seems this needs to be set up: http://docs.travis-ci.com/user/deployment/heroku/#Running-commands ... I guess dpl (and thus travis) doesn't know that this is a rails app and requires running migrations.

Just gonna add this. Let's see what happens :)
